1.0.name: wordpress/simply-tweeted
1.0.description:
*NOTE: This plugin does not have oauth support. Until I have time to further develop this plugin, it will not work with the new twitter... *

Simply Tweeted is a simple, no-frills plugin which updates twitter with the post title and post url upon post or page publishing.

Simply Tweeted is developed as a standalone, but it also provides integration with the URL Shortener Plugin (Ver 2.1 and above).

As of now, it doesn't have oauth support. But version 2.0 will probably include it.

Support via:

  • http://wordpress.org/tags/simply-tweeted
  • Contact me via my website.
